de.sub.goobi.metadaten

Class RenderableMetadatum

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sub.goobi.metadaten.RenderableMetadatum
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RenderableDropDownList, RenderableEdit, RenderableLineEdit, RenderableListBox, RenderableMetadataGroup

    public abstract class RenderableMetadatum
extends Object
    Abstract base class for all kinds of backing beans usable to render input elements in JSF to edit a metadatum. This may be a RenderableMetadataGroup or a class implementing RenderableGroupableMetadatum, where the latter can—but doesn’t have to be—a member of a RenderableMetadataGroup. A RenderableMetadataGroup cannot be a member of a RenderableMetadataGroup itself, whereas a RenderablePersonMetadataGroup, which is a special case of a RenderableMetadataGroup, can.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>

      Holds the metadata type represented by this input element.
      protected boolean readonly
      Indicates whether this metadatum can only be read by the user and not be altered.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderableMetadatum

        protected RenderableMetadatum(Map<String,String> labels,
                              ugh.dl.MetadataGroup binding)
        Creates a renderable metadatum which is not held in a renderable metadata group. A label isn’t needed in this case. This constructor must be used by all successors that do not implement RenderableGroupableMetadatum.
        Parameters:
        labels - available labels for this input element
        binding - a metadata group whose value(s) shall be updated if as the setters for the bean are called

      • RenderableMetadatum

        protected RenderableMetadatum(ugh.dl.MetadataType metadataType,
                              ugh.dl.MetadataGroup binding,
                              RenderableMetadataGroup container)
        Creates a renderable metadatum which held in a renderable metadata group. This constructor must be used by all successors that implement RenderableGroupableMetadatum.
        Parameters:
        metadataType - metadata type represented by this input element
        binding - a metadata group whose value(s) shall be read and updated if as the getters and setters for the bean are called
        container - group that the renderable metadatum is in

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static de.sub.goobi.metadaten.RenderableGroupableMetadatum create(ugh.dl.MetadataType metadataType,
                                                                         ugh.dl.MetadataGroup binding,
                                                                         RenderableMetadataGroup container,
                                                                         String projectName)
                                                                  throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Factory method to create a backing bean to render a metadatum. Depending on the configuration, different input component beans will be created.
        Parameters:
        metadataType - type of metadatum to create a bean for
        binding - a metadata group whose value(s) shall be read and updated if as the getters and setters for the bean are called
        container - container that the metadatum is in, may be null if it isn’t in a container
        projectName - name of the project the document under edit does belong to
        Returns:
        a backing bean to render the metadatum
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if a metadata field designed for a single value is misconfigured to show a multi-value input element

      • getBindState

        protected String getBindState()
        Returns whether the metadatum represented by this instance is about to be created or under edit.
        Returns:
        whether this metadatum is created or edited

      • getBindState

        protected static String getBindState(Object binding)
        Returns whether the metadatum whose binding is passed is about to be created or under edit.
        Parameters:
        binding - an object to bind to, or null
        Returns:
        whether the metadatum is created or edited

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        Returns the label of the metadatum in the language previously set. This is a getter method which is automatically called by Faces to resolve the read-only property “label”, thus we cannot pass the language as a parameter here. It must have been set beforehand.
        Returns:
        the translated label of the metadatum

      • getMetadata

        protected ugh.dl.Metadata getMetadata(String value)
        Creates and returns a metadatum of the internal type with the value passed in.
        Parameters:
        value - value to set the metadatum to
        Returns:
        a metadatum with the value

      • isFirst

        public boolean isFirst()
        Returns true if the metadatum is contained in a metadata group and is the first element in that group. This is to overcome a shortcoming of Tomahawk’s dataList which doesn’t provide a boolean “first” variable to tell whether we are in the first iteration of the loop or not.
        Returns:
        if the metadatum is the first element in its group

      • isReadonly

        public boolean isReadonly()
        Returns whether the metadatum may not be changed by the user.
        Returns:
        whether the metadatum is read-only

      • setReadonly

        protected de.sub.goobi.metadaten.RenderableGroupableMetadatum setReadonly(boolean readolny)
        Can be used do set whether the metadatum may not be changed by the user.
        Parameters:
        readolny - whether the metadatum is read-only
        Returns:
        the object itself, to be able to call the setter in line with the constructor

      • updateBinding

        protected void updateBinding()
        Updates the bound metadata group by the current value(s) of the implementing instance.

      • getItems

        protected final Collection<Item> getItems(String projectName,
                                          DisplayType type)
        Returns the available items for select input elements. The available items can vary depending on the project, wheter the metadata element is about to be created or is under edit, the metadata type and the type of the input element. Since the items hold their selected state and ConfigDispayRules does return the same item instances again if called several times, we need to create a deep copy of the retrieved list here, so that several select lists lists of the same type can hold their individual selected state.
        Parameters:
        projectName - project of the process owning this metadatum
        type - type of input element to get the items for
        Returns:
        the collection of available items for the input element
